student_cohort.name: student_cohort
student_cohort.description: Cohort of the student, containing university, qualification and year of admission, in the format [University Name]_[Qualification] [MonthYear of Admission]

placement_name.name: placement_name
placement_name.description: Name of the placement, usually referring to the year and number of the placement

placement_start_date.name: placement_start_date
placement_start_date.description: Date on which the placement should start

placement_len_weeks.name: placement_len_weeks
placement_len_weeks.description: Length of the placement in weeks

student_cohort.name: student_cohort
student_cohort.description: Cohort of the student, containing university, qualification and year of admission, in the format [University Name]_[Qualification] [MonthYear of Admission]

qualification.name: qualification
qualification.description: Qualification the student is studying for

prev_placements.name: prev_placements
prev_placements.description: A list of previous wards that the student has been on placement at, in the format ['wardname1','wardname2','wardname3']

allowable_covid_status.name: allowable_covid_status
allowable_covid_status.description: The level of covid risk that the student can tolerate

education_audit_exp.name: education_audit_exp
education_audit_exp.description: Expiry date of the Education Audit

covid_status.name: covid_status
covid_status.description: Level of covid risk that the ward holds

p1_cap.name: p1_cap
p1_cap.description: The number of year 1 (or part 1) students that the ward can accommodate

p2_cap.name: p2_cap
p2_cap.description: The number of year 2 (or part 2) students that the ward can accommodate

p3_cap.name: p3_cap
p3_cap.description: The number of year 3 (or part 3) students that the ward can accommodate
